name: veo3-prompt-d20
description: VEO3 Prompt D(20+) - ตัวช่วยเรื่องพรอมต์ที่ถูกกำจัด

scripts.push: git add -A && git commit -m "Update: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push origin main
scripts.push-custom: git add -A && read -p 'Commit message: ' msg && git commit -m "$msg" && git push origin main
scripts.quick-push: git add -A && git commit -m "Quick update" && git push origin main

author: spsocial
